name: Dreamscape Return
description:
"Dreamscape Return" is a simple yet challenging puzzle game. In this game, the player's task is to connect all the patterns, but there is an important rule: you cannot repeat the lines you have already walked.

The rules of the game are very simple. Each level starts from a designated starting pattern. Players need to plan the path cleverly to ensure that a line connects all patterns. Carefully designing routes and thinking quickly are the keys to successfully completing each level. Players need to complete the challenge within the stipulated 5 minutes. When the challenge time is insufficient, the game provides a button option to skip this level. Players can choose to continue the challenge or directly enter the next level.

"Dreamscape Return" not only exercises players' spatial cognition and logical thinking abilities, but also provides players with a pleasant and relaxing gaming experience. Get ready to take on the challenge, push your limits and have fun playing the game!
